questions.question: In the United States alone more than 40,000 people die every year in car accidents and hundreds of thousands more ..................................... personal and financial injury.
No matter how efficient, how safe or how .........................................., trains cannot offer the thrill and sense of empowerment provided by the car.

Though their intelligence and ..................................... long lifespan are traits shared by the other great primates, the social behavior and general lifestyle of orangutans are quite different.
........................................ made Jack Kerouac the most celebrated member of the Beat Generation were his autobiographical novels and wayward travels.
The Romans perfected the art of building arch bridges and ......................................... them throughout the Roman Empire.
